properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 3:00PM MST until January 12 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12
inches.

* WHERE...Central Mountains.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Saturday to 10 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and occasional
difficult travel over mountain passes, especially Saturday
evening.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Impacted mountain passes include Interstate
70.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SATURDAY TO 10 AM MST SUNDAY
